thread.title: Magdeburg Zoo's rare white lion cubs play with each other | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Magdeburg Zoo's rare white lion cubs play with each other | Daily Mail Online

author: Amie Gordon For Mailonline
title: Magdeburg Zoo's rare white lion cubs play with each other | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Can I have a cuddle, please Dad? Rare white lion cubs show affection for their parents at German zoo The white lion cubs - three males and one female - were born at Magdeburg Zoo in Germany on Christmas Day Extremely rare big cats almost extinct in their native Timbavati, South Africa because of the poaching trade Parents kept a watchful eye over their cubs, each of which has a recessive gene causing their unusual colour
